nodes.text: New Atraken City was a city located half a kilometer below the surface of Trilos. Originally a small community for miners and their families, the evacuation of Atraken and the influx of refugees pushed the population up to around 40,000 by 6 ABY. New Atraken City was connected to Starport Touchdown via access paths, and by double-track subway to the Old Mine. Two cantinas, the Last Resort and Downside, were located in New Atraken City.
